Html: Are there any future plans to add language pack/functionality to CSK? It's really tough to convert (reverse engineer) English to another language :)

Not now... we need to get some of the big features of the next release in... we will probably start support for language packs arround the release of 3.0

Sorry that we can't help at the moment.

I agree, it's very time consuming to create all text in the resource files.

I would say that any new features should use the resource files for content.

If and when we create the English resource files would Plaid like to convert them another language for us? Which languages did you have in mind?

I would gladly convert it into Turkish (as my native language). Btw, i also want to contribute the project, too.

P.S: I am about to implement a document upload (and listing) feature to CSK, just like Photo uploading mechanism.
